response.original_title: MANTRA WARRIOR:THE LEGEND OF THE EIGHT MOON
response.overview: The Simian Race and Giants have waged wars over the possession of the Celestial Secret Weapon for years. They are waiting for the eight moons to align for the first time in two hundred years to reveal the prophesied hero, the Mantra Warrior. Armed with valour and unwavering determination, the warrior will guard the weapon and preserve the celestial balance, ensuring the harmony of the realm.
response.title: MANTRA WARRIOR:THE LEGEND OF THE EIGHT MOON
